Starting, Stopping, and Shutting Down Service Assemblies

When you start, stop, or shut down a service assembly, the action is performed on all of the service units in the service assembly. You cannot perform these actions on an individual service unit.

If a service assembly is started, then the only enabled action is Stop.

To start, stop, or shut down a service assembly

  1. In the left pane, select a service assembly.

  2. In the right pane, click Start, Stop, or Shutdown.
